name: Need 4 Greed: A Finite Runner
description:
A fast-paced finite runner that tests your reflexes as you skillfully jump, dodge and stomp your way to riches. 

Keyboard Controls

AD -- Move Left/Right

Space -- Jump

Need 4 Greed is a low-poly 3D runner where you are constantly moving forward while avoiding obstacles and enemies — or stomping on them — while building up your collective wealth.

Unlike other runners, N4G is finite, not endless.  Throughout each level you're tasked with collecting enough moolah to pass each respective checkpoint. You can do so by collecting the coins laid out generously throughout the track or by stomping on your foes and turning them into pancakes.

Each level comprises three segments — each one throwing more obstacles, enemies and coins your way. All while you're barreling faster than before, constantly testing your reflexes every frantic step of the way.
